nodes.text: The Dearic Medical Center was a small hospital in the city of Dearic on Talus. It had beds for several patients and medical equipment including a 2-1B surgical droid to treat them.

In 1 ABY the Drall ambassador to Talus, Champhra Biahin, could often be found in this facility. Aspiring medics could also find helpful physicians here who would share some of their medical knowledge with them.
